name: Baldi's Basics Challenges Demo Plus! (Alpha)
description:
This mod is an improved version of "Baldi's Basics Challenges Maps Demo".

You have 3 modes:
Grapple - You found yourself without legs, and you can only move with the grapple hook!
 Speedy - Will you be able to collect 25 notebooks and get out of school, despite the fact that you and baldy are super fast?
 Stealhy - You need to collect 7 notebooks after school, but the school is patrolled by the principals! Use Dirty Chalk Eraser so they can't see you!
(sorry for bad english i use translator RUS-ENG)
